German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Pommes frites
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from French pommes frites (“lit. fried apples (of the earth)”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˌpɔmˈfʁɪt/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Pommes frites pl

  1. french fries, chips

Usage notes[edit]

  • There is also an uncommon singular form Pomme frite f.

Declension[edit]

Synonyms[edit]

  • Fritten f pl, singular Fritte f,
